titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford University, Libraries, Department of Special Collections and Archives, staff photograph album
Stanford University, Libraries, Department of Special Collections and Archives, staff photograph album

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: Stanford University, Libraries, Department of Special Collections and Archives, staff photograph album
did.abstract: Photograph album, "Stanford University Archives: A Tribute to Ralph W. Hansen," September 1979. Photographs of various library staff members at work in Cecil H. Green Library and at a party off campus.
did.physloc: Special Collections and University Archives materials are stored offsite and must be paged 36-48 hours in advance. For more information on paging collections, see the department's website: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/spc.html.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: [identification of item], Stanford University, Libraries, Department of Special Collections and Archives, staff photograph album (A0117). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical note
bioghist.p: Ralph Hansen served as curator of the Stanford Collection from 1962–65 and as Stanford University Archivist from 1965–79.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Photograph album, "Stanford University Archives: A Tribute to Ralph W. Hansen," September 1979. Photographs of various library staff members at work in Cecil H. Green Library and at a party off campus. Also included are a 1979 Library Telephone directory and a listing of photograph subjects.
